NPM: npm install --production // will install not dev Dependencies (just dependencies)
npm view `package_name (for instance @angular/core or moment or file-saver)` versions //  list of all available versions
npm install --save-dev //  install only dev dependencies.
package-lock is needed for keeping the tree of all installed dependencies.
npm update -- will perform update on all listed packages to the latest version.
npm update <package> -- will update specific package.
